Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- City of Plaquemine
City of Plaquemine Prop. No. 1 -- 3.1 Mills - (Police) - Mayor & BOS - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Plaquemine Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Plaquemine, State of Louisiana (the "City"), levy a special tax of three and one-tenth (3.1) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the City (an estimated $102,675 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating the Police Department of the City?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Plaquemine Prop. No. 2 -- 3.1 Mills - (Buildings) - Mayor & BOS - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Plaquemine Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Plaquemine, State of Louisiana (the "City"), levy a special tax of three and one-tenth (3.1) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the City (an estimated $102,675 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating public buildings in the City?
